name: Leonardo S.p.A.
membership: ASD (Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe) - EOS (European Organization for Security) - Confindustria
goal: Leonardo is the main Italian industrial group operating globally in the aerospace, defence and security sectors, and is one of the world's leading groups in the fields of helicopters and defence electronics. It is also a European Leader for satellite and space services. Headquartered in Italy, and with a vast industrial base in the UK as well as important production facilities in the rest of Europe and the USA, Leonardo has a workforce more than 45,000.
interests: Budget, Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU and NATO activities related with Aerospace Security and Defence
